20110112180746.000|20110112180748.000|CC1|WAS THERE ANY GOOD APPROACH FOR

20110112183328.000|20110112183330.000|CC1|RIGHT NOW IT LOOKS PRETTY GRIM.

20110112183333.000|20110112183334.000|CC1|ANDREA WE HAD NOTHING ON THE

20110112183349.000|20110112183351.000|CC1|THAT STICKS ON THE ROADWAYS.

20110112183534.000|20110112183535.000|CC1|>> I KNOW YOU FOLKS UP THERE ARE

20110112184523.000|20110112184523.000|CC1|THEMSELVES.

20110112184524.000|20110112184526.000|CC1|THERE'S FRUSTRATION, BUT I SAY  
20110112184526.000|20110112184532.000|CC1|HOPE STILL OUTWEIGHS THE        
20110112184532.000|20110112184532.000|CC1|FRUSTRATION.                    
20110112184532.000|20110112184534.000|CC1|>> MARA SPOKE TO PRESIDENT      
20110112184534.000|20110112184536.000|CC1|CLINTON AND JOINS US NOW FROM   
20110112184536.000|20110112184537.000|CC1|PORT-au-PRINCE.                 
20110112184537.000|20110112184538.000|CC1|WHAT ARE THE REASONS FOR THE

20110112184602.000|20110112184605.000|CC1|ABOUT 60% OF PLEDGES HAVE BEEN

20110112184605.000|20110112184607.000|CC1|HOWEVER IN THE LAST YEAR, WE    
20110112184607.000|20110112184608.000|CC1|HAVE SEEN MINIMAL SIGNS OF      
20110112184608.000|20110112184610.000|CC1|PROGRESS, IT'S ESTIMATED THAT   
20110112184610.000|20110112184612.000|CC1|ONLY 10% OF THE RUBBLE HAS BEEN

20110112185500.000|20110112185502.000|CC1|>> AND JUST VERY QUICKLY, THIS
